title: (x) Fat sans on "Sommerfoyer" flyer by Büro Destruct - Dazzle {Angel}
content:
Hi there.

I'm sure I've already saw this one already, but where?  
This specimen comes from a party flyer made by [Büro Destruct](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020133028/http:/www.burodestruct.net/), so it might be a custom made font, or not…

Thanks for your hypothetic help!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [sommerfoyer.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020133028/http:/typophile.com/files/sommerfoyer.png) | 18.93 KB |
author: Gregory Cadars

comments.content: Angel's help is anything but hypothetic, I can assure you. ;^)
